org.roug.osnine

Class VirtualDisk

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.roug.osnine.MemorySegment
      • org.roug.osnine.VirtualDisk

  • public class VirtualDisk
extends MemorySegment
    Virtualized block device. Takes 3 bytes of memory. It requires a special OS9 device driver to work. Operations: To read a buffer do: Write the LSN value into the bufferAddress and valueRegister. This can be done with a write_word(). Write READ_BUFFER into the OPCODE register. This will load a sector and reset the bufferAddress to 0. Read the OPCODE register to check for errors. Write READ_BYTE in to OPCODE register. This will place a byte from the buffer into the valueRegister and increment the bufferRegister.
